TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MatchAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MatchAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MatchAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示使用文本模式匹配进行的匹配的特性。

span.span: Represents the attributes of a match made using text pattern matching.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文本模式匹配允许 XML Web service 使用正则表达式分析现有 HTML 内容。Text pattern matching allows an XML Web service to leverage existing HTML content by parsing it using regular expressions. XML Web service 使用 match 元素指定要在服务说明中分析的内容。an XML Web service specifies the content it wants to parse in a Service Description using match elements. 这些匹配元素指定多个项：用于分析现有 HTML 页的内容的正则表达式，无论分析是否必须区分大小写，以及应返回与正则表达式匹配的内容实例数。These match elements specify several items: the regular expression for parsing the contents of an existing HTML page, whether the parsing must be case-insensitive, and how many instances of content that matches the regular expression should be returned. 当客户端使用 Wsdl.exe 工具生成代理类时，代理类的方法将 详细说明在服务说明中找到的匹配元素。When a client builds a proxy class using the Wsdl.exe tool, methods of the proxy class include a detailing the match elements found in the Service Description. 有关文本模式匹配的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：创建分析网页内容的 Web 服务](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xxb0bsdh(v=vs.100))。For more information on text pattern matching, see [How to: Create Web Services That Parse the Contents of a Web Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/xxb0bsdh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 使用指定模式的类的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified pattern. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |模式Pattern|`pattern` 参数的值。The value of the `pattern` parameter.| ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定匹配项所属的组。Use the property to specify a group that a match belongs to. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#6)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#6)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要从匹配返回的值的最大数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of values to return from the match.

value.span: 要从匹配返回的值的最大数目。

span.span: The maximum number of values to return from the match.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指代返回所有值。

span.span: The default value is -1, which refers to returning all values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值为 1，则仅返回第一个匹配项。A value of 1 returns only the first match. 如果值为 -1，则返回所有匹配项。A value of -1 returns all matches. 此外，值-1 相当于正则表达式中的 "\*"。Additionally, a value of -1 equates to an '\*' in a regular expression. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#7)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定表示要匹配的值的正则表达式。Use the property to specify a regular expression that represents the value to match. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CPP/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/CS/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.cs#4)] [!code-vb[MatchAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MatchAttribute/VB/SvcClient_MatchAttribute.vb#4)]
